mapper.insert: INSERT INTO user_car_connector ( user_car_idx, ac_slow, dc_combo, dc_chademo, ac_three_phase, tesla, mobile_plug, wireless ) SELECT #{userCarIdx}, supports_ac_slow, supports_dc_combo, supports_dc_chademo, supports_ac_three_phase, supports_tesla, supports_mobile_plug, supports_wireless FROM car_spec WHERE car_idx = #{carIdx}
